content.NAME: Katana
content.DESCRIPTION: Swift notches with high reach. Allows for more speed. Damage scales with speed.

content.NAME: Wings
content.DESCRIPTION: Two wings propulsing backwards. Gives a high air mobility. Staying airborne increases damage.

content.NAME: Daggers
content.DESCRIPTION: Very fast stabs with low reach. Chaining attacks rewards with a higher critical rate.

content.NAME: WarAxe
content.DESCRIPTION: High damage, but only on the Axe's blades. Taking too much damage increases yours.

content.NAME: Gun
content.DESCRIPTION: Fire small but quick bullets. Very high firing rate, with a precision increasing with time firing.

content.NAME: Shuriken
content.DESCRIPTION: Sends a fast, large and piercing projectile. Killing two enemies quickly increases your damage.

content.NAME: Fist
content.DESCRIPTION: Your fists. Bad at everything, take a weapon or face the consequences of your choices.
